# progress

**Instance Property**

An object you can use to track the progress while reading an attachment’s data.

## Declaration

```swift
var progress: Progress { get }
```

## Reading attachment data

- **data**: The abstract’s data.
- **bytes**: An asynchronous sequence that provides the attachment’s data.

items.description: An asynchronous sequence that provides the attachment’s data.
